electronics.name: Samsung Galaxy On
electronics.desc: The On Nxt is a performance beast, thanks to the powerful 1.6 GHz, octa-core processor that’s aided by an impressive amount of RAM (3 GB). Furthermore, it has 64 GB of internal memory, so you can store loads of photos, videos, apps and more.

reviews.title: Decent Performance
reviews.comment: Decent camera - good in day light - Battery lasts a business day with full 4 G on -Fingerprint scanner works well

reviews.title: Worth every penny
reviews.comment: The mobile is good enough for daily uses.. But battery & camera department lacks a little bit.

reviews.title: First Impression

electronics.name: Samsung Galaxy J3 Pro
electronics.desc: Brilliant Display-With the Samsung Galaxy J3 Pro, you will get to enjoy the vivid colours that OLED displays are known for. Enjoy your favourite content on a compact, 12.63-cm (5) Super AMOLED display which makes the phone fit easily in the palm of your hand.

electronics.name: Samsung Galaxy J7 Nxt

features.warrenty: Brand Warranty of 1 Year Available for Mobile and 6 Months for Accessories

electronics.desc: A phone catering to today’s needs, the Samsung Galaxy J7 Nxt is equipped with features like Samsung Pay Mini for a hassle-free digital payment experience. You can click delightful pictures on-the-go with the phone’s 13 MP rear camera and 5 MP front camera. This phone will be a delight for those who love clicking selfies owing to features like the Selfie Focus. This phone has a 3000 mAh battery.
